content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello, Yi-Nuo Wang. It's good to see you interested in my apartment. As you know, the location is excellent, and the apartment is brand new. I'm sure you'll find it a comfortable place to live. So, let's discuss the rent. How much are you willing to pay for such a prime location?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Your apartment is great, but the city center is not the best place for me. I would like to offer 450 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 450 euros per month is too low for this apartment. It's a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all amenities. I'm looking for a rent that reflects the value of the location and the quality of the space. How about we start at 700 euros per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, I am a student and I have to consider my financial situation. I am willing to pay 550 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 550 euros per month is more in line with what I was expecting. It's still lower than my initial offer, but considering your situation, I'm willing to be flexible. If you're a long-term tenant, I could see myself agreeing to this price. Would you be willing to sign a one-year lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am willing to sign a one-year lease. I am also a dependable and responsible person. I will take good care of your apartment. I am willing to pay 575 euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Your offer of 575 euros per month is very close to my asking price. I appreciate your responsiveness and willingness to negotiate. Considering your commitment as a long-term tenant, I'm willing to accept your offer. We have a deal at 575 euros per month. Please let me know if you need any additional paperwork or if there's anything else I can assist you with. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
